General.Name: CC Japan Income and Growth Trust PLC
General.Description: CC Japan Income & Growth Trust plc is an equity mutual fund launched and managed by Coupland Cardiff Asset Management LLP. It invests in the equity markets of Japan. The fund invests in stocks of companies operating across the diversified sectors. CC Japan Income & Growth Trust plc was formed in 2013 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 31-32 St. Jame's Street, London, United Kingdom, SW1A 1HD

ESGScores.Disclaimer: The ESG data currently in a very early Beta stage and not intended for any production use. It will be removed from the feed on December 31, 2020.
